linear.text: Welcome! I'm Professor Oak, a Pokemon researcher.
I need your help with an important research project.
I'm studying these specific Pokemon species.
Press 'Z' to see the list of Pokemon I need you to catch.
For each new Pokemon you bring me, I'll reward you!
Take this items with you in this adventure.
Are you ready to help advance Pokemon research?
Oh, I see your team is empty at the moment.
Come back when you've caught something!
Remember to check your research list.
Ah, you're back! Let's see what you've brought.
I'm interested in species you haven't caught before!
Keep up the good work!
Outstanding work! You're very close to completing the research!
Just a few more Pokemon species to study.
Let's see what you've brought this time.
Remarkable! You've helped me study all the Pokemon I needed!
Your contribution to Pokemon research has been invaluable.
Please accept this special Certificate as proof of your achievement.
And of course, some extra special rewards for your outstanding work!
Excellent! This is the first time you've brought me this Pokémon!
Here's a reward for your effort! Keep up the great work!
Wow! You've caught 10 Pokémon of this species! Here's an Ultra Ball and a Sweet Bait as a reward!
Thank you for your dedication!
Thank you for bringing me another Pokémon of this species!
Here's a a reward. Your effort is much appreciated!
Congratulations on completing the research!
I present you with the Professor's Certificate and some special rewards for your dedication!
